data.name: Meghna Bank Liability Management & 360-Degree Customer
data.description:
As the Frontend Team Lead, I led the development of a web application aimed at improving banking services for customers in Bangladesh.
The project involved live data integration for searching, viewing, and generating reports on customer-related information.

Responsibilities:

1. Led the frontend team in building a responsive, scalable application using React.js, Material UI, React-Bootstrap, and RTK.
2. Integrated real-time data handling through Redux Query and microservices architecture.
3. Ensured best practices through code reviews and mentoring junior developers.
4. Collaborated with backend teams for seamless integration of microservices.
5. Designed an intuitive and user-friendly interface, improving the overall user experience.

data.name: Liability Workflow (City Bank Limited)
data.description:
As a Frontend Developer, I contributed to the development of a web application designed to streamline banking services for customers in Bangladesh.
The project focused on integrating live data for searching, viewing, and generating reports related to customer information.

Responsibilities:

1. Collected client requirements to understand needs and expectations.
2. Created dynamic forms using custom JSON for data handling.
3. Implemented file upload functionality for data management in tables.
4. Collaborated with the backend team to integrate APIs into the frontend.
5. Designed reusable React components for tables, modals, and error handling.
6. Adapted design to meet client specifications for a responsive interface.
7. Conducted client meetings for feedback and updates.
8. Resolved UAT-related issues to improve application performance.

data.name: Bhutan Integrated Revenue Management System (BIRMS)
data.description:
The Royal Government of Bhutan's new Bhutan Integrated Revenue Management System (BIRMS) is a system for the DRC's Revenue Division, to manage its operations.
I have worked on that project as a Front-end developer.

As a Front-end developer I have:


1. Engage with clients, design systems per requirements.
2. Proficiently manage team members, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of system functionality and fostering collaboration.
3. Engage in seamless coordination with backend developers to effectively integrate APIs, enhancing project development and delivery.

data.name: Tutory Club
data.description:
As a full-stack developer specializing in the MERN stack, I play a crucial role in both front-end and back-end development of web applications.

My responsibilities included:

1. Engaging with clients to gather requirements and design systems that meet their needs effectively.
2. Proficiently managing team members, ensuring a thorough understanding of system functionality and fostering collaboration among all stakeholders.
3. Coordinating seamlessly with backend developers to integrate APIs, enhancing the overall project development and delivery process.

Through this experience, I have ensured a seamless and responsive user experience while maintaining the integrity of the entire web application.

data.name: SMS BANGLADESH
data.description:
The SMS Bangladesh project is a comprehensive system developed using Laravel for managing operations efficiently. I have worked on that project as a Front-end Developer. My responsibilities included:

1. Engaging with clients to understand their requirements and designing systems that meet their needs effectively.
2. Proficiently managing team members, ensuring a thorough understanding of system functionality and fostering collaboration.
3. Coordinating seamlessly with backend developers to integrate APIs, enhancing project development and delivery.

Through this experience, I contributed to creating a user-friendly interface while ensuring the overall integrity of the application.
